name: Mezular figurine artifakt
description: Uncovered by the MAD (Mars Archaeological Department) during the 2021 coastal surveys, the 10 Mezular figurines were found alongside an old manuscript. The inscription mentions the need of 10 new guardians (owners) for them to activate. Once in their hands, they will work as a key to pinpoint the location of the 2 lost Mezular temples. Will you help the MAD? Will you save Mars?
